articles.description: Nathan Jahnke gives some of his sleeper NFL wide receivers ahead of the 2022 fantasy football season.
articles.content:
Picking the right wide receiver in the middle-to-late rounds offantasy football drafts could be the key to winning a league.

articles.author: John Denton
articles.title: Albert Pujols passes Stan Musial on extra-base hit list - MLB.com
articles.description: ST. LOUIS -- Back at Busch Stadium for his first Opening Day since 2011 earlier this season, Cardinals slugger Albert Pujols admitted he teared up and got extremely emotional that April afternoon, but not for the reasons many might have expected.
